cells.data: -- take N Members of an infinite cycle of xs, starting from index I

-- takeDropCycle :: Int -> [a] -> [a]on takeDropCycle(n, i, xs)	set lng to length of xs	set m to n + i		if lng â‰¥ m then		set ys to xs	else		set ys to concat(replicate(ceiling(m / lng), xs))	end if		drop(i, take(m, ys))end takeDropCycle
